value.title: AI and Satellite Data Could Help End Slavery on the High Seas
value.excerpt: Slavery is rampant on fishing vessels around the world. A new study aims to use satellite and machine learning to track ships that traffic laborers. The findings estimate up to 100,000 people were forced to labor on fishing vessels between 2012 and 2018.

value.title: Mercedes teases an AI-powered version of its MBUX infotainment system
value.excerpt: When the new Mercedes EQS sedan hits the road next year, it will feature a new and improved version of the automaker’s MBUX infotainment called the MBUX Hyperscreen as an optional upgrade. The company says the ultrawide screen spans the entire front dashboard of the upcoming EV and adds AI to the mix to make using the system more intuitive.
